term.title: allylic groups

item.text: The group CH2=CHCH2 (allyl) and derivatives formed by substitution. The term 'allylic position' or 'allylic site' refers to the saturated carbon atom. A group, such as â€“OH, attached at an allylic site is sometimes described as 'allylic'.
